title: Contents & Community Manager - 사업개발팀
content:
주요 업무
                    Contents & Community Manager - 사업개발팀인턴/신입, 파트타임, 풀타임 가능1. Writing and managing product related contents (English or Korean)2. Managing various community groups, social media channels

업무 관련 기술 / 활동 분야
        
          SNS 채널관리
          SNS콘텐츠
          contents creating
          translation
          Marketing Communication

채용 상세
                    담당업무- SNS channel management- Content creation- Translation (English<>Korean or Chinese)- User Relations/communication자격요건- Fluent English Speaker- Open-minded우대사항- Experience with blockchai…
            더 보기
            담당업무- SNS channel management- Content creation- Translation (English<>Korean or Chinese)- User Relations/communication자격요건- Fluent English Speaker- Open-minded우대사항- Experience with blockchain related activity or work- Experience with dApps (decentralized applications)- Chinese Speaker- Spanish Speaker
